p: Kidney was immediately removed from animals and washed with water and blotted dry and weighed, then fixed in 10% formalin for histopathological analysis. Histological sections of the kidney were stained with hematoxylin and eosin. Then, the tissue was examined for necrosis, multifocal interstitial nephritis, hemorrhage, periglomerular leukocytic infiltration, distorted glomerular tufts and tubular degeneration.
